snippet.title: "It's Not Fair" Amber Heard Responds To Losing ALL Movie Roles
snippet.description:
"It's Not Fair" Amber Heard Responds To Losing ALL Movie Roles 
"It's not fair," said Amber Heard as she responded to losing her movie roles. This is at the time that the petition made on change.org has reached more than 1.8 million signatures. Jeanne Larson was the person who initiated this petition initially, and about 1,856,217 have signed this petition as of this moment. In its own words, the petition demands to "Remove Amber Heard from Aquaman 2". There are a lot of reasons as to why people have begun to get behind this petition so fast. The number was well under a million during 2020, and prior to that, this petition wasn't nearly as popular. But with each passing day, the number of signatures is increasing at the highest rate since it was created. Why is this so?

Here on Film Streak we are all about the latest spill in Hollywood! You can rest assure that we will bring you all the latest celebrity drama and gossip especially concerning you favorite actors! We´ll also make sure to keep you updated on the newest movie updates and releases – so if you are interested in anything that happens in Hollywood, you should make sure to stay tuned!  

And there you have it guys! We hope you enjoyed the video! If you did please consider leaving a like and telling us what you though in the comments! 

Here are some links to some of our other videos that you might find interesting as well:
"FORGIVE ME" Justin Bieber Apologies to Haily Bieber (IG LIVE VIDEO): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u-m_Q7FS91I
Emilia Clarke REACTION Before Replacing Amber Heard in Aquaman 2! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PYXp9wXHUWw
Johnny Depp OFFICIALLY REHIRED | Back In a New Pirates of the Caribbean 6 Movie? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=utozMdfngVk
Elon Musk Speaks Against Amber Heard & Defends Johnny Depp!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wOo2BFTRrL4

So, if you are interested in anything related to Hollywood, make sure to smash that subscribe button to see more of our content in the future! 🎬 https://bit.ly/3kzplQd 

#AmberHeard #JohnnyDepp #Aquaman2 #JusticeForJohnny #FilmStreak
